.popup-vimeo").magnificPopup({disableOn:700,type:"iframe",mainClass:"mfp-fade",removalDelay:160,preloader:!1,fixedContentPos:!1})}); // hamburger const hamburgerMenu = document.querySelector(".hamburger-menu"); const nav = document.querySelector(".nav"); hamburgerMenu.addEventListener("click", () => { nav.classList.toggle("active") }); // 2. LOGIKA 3D LOADER & ANIMASI var triggerFinishAnimation; (function() { var $container = document.getElementById('cssload'); if (!$container) return; // 1. Ambil ukuran layar var width = $container.clientWidth || window.innerWidth; var height = $container.clientHeight || window.innerHeight; if (height === 0) height = window.innerHeight; var length = 30, radius = 5.6, rotatevalue = 0.035, acceleration = 0, animatestep = 0, toend = false, pi2 = Math.PI * 2, group = new THREE.Group(), mesh, ringcover, ring, camera, scene, renderer; // 2. Setup Kamera camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(65, width / height, 1, 10000); // --- PERBAIKAN ZOOM (Disini kuncinya) --- // Jika layar HP (lebar < tinggi), kamera mundur ke 250. // Jika Desktop, tetap di 150 seperti aslinya. if (width < height) { camera.position.z = 250; // Mundur untuk HP (atur angka ini jika kurang pas) } else { camera.position.z = 150; // Posisi asli untuk Desktop } scene = new THREE.Scene(); scene.add(group); mesh = new THREE.Mesh( new THREE.TubeGeometry(new(THREE.Curve.create(function() {}, function(percent) { var x = length * Math.sin(pi2 * percent), y = radius * Math.cos(pi2 * 3 * percent), z, t; t = percent % 0.25 / 0.25; t = percent % 0.25 - (2 * (1 - t) * t * -0.0185 + t * t * 0.25); if (Math.floor(percent / 0.25) == 0 || Math.floor(percent / 0.25) == 2) { t *= -1; } z = radius * Math.sin(pi2 * 2 * (percent - t)); return new THREE.Vector3(x, y, z); } ))(), 200, 1.1, 2, true), new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({ color: 0xffffff }) ); group.add(mesh); ringcover = new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.PlaneGeometry(50, 15, 1), new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({ color: 0x3399FF, opacity: 0, transparent: true })); ringcover.position.x = length + 1; ringcover.rotation.y = Math.PI / 2; group.add(ringcover); ring = new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.RingGeometry(4.3, 5.55, 32), new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({ color: 0xffffff, opacity: 0, transparent: true })); ring.position.x = length + 1.1; ring.rotation.y = Math.PI / 2; group.add(ring); (function() { var plain, i; for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) { plain = new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.PlaneGeometry(length * 2 + 1, radius * 3, 1), new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({ color: 0x3399FF, transparent: true, opacity: 0.13 })); plain.position.z = -2.5 + i * 0.5; group.add(plain); } })(); renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({ antialias: true, alpha: true }); renderer.setPixelRatio(window.devicePixelRatio); renderer.setSize(width, height); renderer.setClearColor('#3399FF'); $container.appendChild(renderer.domElement); // Auto-resize handler window.addEventListener('resize', function() { var newWidth = $container.clientWidth || window.innerWidth; var newHeight = $container.clientHeight || window.innerHeight; camera.aspect = newWidth / newHeight; camera.updateProjectionMatrix(); // Update posisi kamera juga saat resize (opsional) if (newWidth < newHeight) { camera.position.z = 250; } else { camera.position.z = 150; } renderer.setSize(newWidth, newHeight); }); function easing(t, b, c, d) { if ((t /= d / 2) < 1) return c / 2 * t * t + b; return c / 2 * ((t -= 2) * t * t + 2) + b; } function render() { var progress; animatestep = Math.max(0, Math.min(240, toend ? animatestep + 1 : animatestep - 4)); acceleration = easing(animatestep, 0, 1, 240); if (acceleration > 0.35) { progress = (acceleration - 0.35) / 0.65; group.rotation.y = -Math.PI / 2 * progress; group.position.z = 50 * progress; progress = Math.max(0, (acceleration - 0.97) / 0.03); mesh.material.opacity = 1 - progress; ringcover.material.opacity = ring.material.opacity = progress; ring.scale.x = ring.scale.y = 0.9 + 0.1 * progress; } renderer.render(scene, camera); } function animate() { mesh.rotation.x += rotatevalue + acceleration; render(); requestAnimationFrame(animate); } animate(); triggerFinishAnimation = function() { toend = true; }; })(); // 3. TRIGGER LOAD & TRANSITION $(window).on("load", function() { if (typeof triggerFinishAnimation === "function") { triggerFinishAnimation(); } setTimeout(function() { $("#cssload").fadeOut(1000, function() { // Animasi selesai, UIkit akan jalan otomatis }); }, 4000); }); //
